name: Family Wellness Program
description: CARECEN's Family Wellness Program staff guide low-income, immigrant and recently arrived children and families to vital services and local resources including crisis management, making referrals, advocating on their behalf and providing emotional support to help families. Comprehensive case management and family support Information, referrals and service connection Individual and family counseling System navigation and advocacy Language access support

whatTheyOffer: CARECEN's Family Wellness Program staff guide low-income, immigrant and recently arrived children and families to vital services and local resources including crisis management, making referrals, advocating on their behalf and providing emotional support to help families. Comprehensive case management and family support Information, referrals and service connection Individual and family counseling System navigation and advocacy Language access support
howToGetIt: Eligibility: Low-income and immigrant families with children birth to 18-years-old Recently arrived unaccompanied children and families in San Francisco Immigration Court Call (415) 872-7465 on Wednesdays 9am-12pm for a free consultation.
address: 3101 Mission Street, Suite 101,  San Francisco, CA, 94110
